item.title: 中国市场持续疲软，欧莱雅销售额增长令人失望
item.description: 欧莱雅公司（L'Oréal SA）报告称，由于中国市场的疲软，这家全球最大的美容产品生产商第二季度的销售额增长乏力。【原文：L’Oréal SA reported sluggish sales growth for the second quarter as the world’s biggest maker of beauty products suffered from weakness in China.】

item.title: 债券销售激增，债务基金经理打包笔记本度假
item.description: 今年夏天，企业在美国债市大举借贷，促使资金经理们在这个历来平静的季节里外出度假时带上笔记本电脑。【原文：Companies have been borrowing heavily in US debt markets this summer, spurring money managers to pack their laptops when they head out on vacation during what was historically a quiet time of year.】

item.title: 飞机交付量下降，空客盈利放缓
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在第二季度的营业利润下降了一半以上，原因是该公司在航天部门计入了一笔费用，迫使其在飞机交付量低于预期的情况下削减成本。【原文：Airbus SE’s operating profit fell by more than half in the second quarter after the company booked a charge at its space unit, forcing it to cut costs amid lower-than-anticipated aircraft deliveries.】

item.title: 监狱电话公司 ViaPath 在新的 FCC 规则出台后完成 13.8 亿美元的债务出售
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）出台新规定，限制了监狱通信服务提供商的通话费用，ViaPath Technologies 公司在暂时停止交易后，完成了价值 13.8 亿美元的再融资交易。【原文：ViaPath Technologies has completed a $1.38 billion refinancing transaction after temporarily pausing the process following new regulations from the Federal Communications Commission that curtail how much the prison-communications provider can charge for calls.】

item.title: 英国南方水务公司面临被穆迪降至 "垃圾 "级的风险
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）正在考虑将英国公用事业公司南方水务公司（Southern Water）的高级债务评级下调至垃圾级，这是泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的麻烦可能蔓延到该国水务行业其他部门的最新迹象。【原文：Moody’s Ratings is considering a downgrade to junk for the senior debt of UK utility Southern Water, the latest sign that troubles at Thames Water could spill over into other parts of the country’s water sector.】

item.title: 英国在业界抗议声中提高北海石油和天然气税
item.description: 英国新政府兑现了加强北海油气生产商税收制度的承诺，提高了暴利税，并取消了部分投资津贴。【原文：The new UK government followed through on its pledge to toughen up the tax regime for North Sea oil and gas producers, increasing a windfall levy and ending some investment allowances.】

item.title: 隐形的 "特朗普交易 "让一度沉睡的 ETF 重获新生，资产增加
item.description: 两只追踪美国制造投资主题的ETF悄然聚集资产，反映出投资者坚信国内制造业将在下届总统政府中蓬勃发展。【原文：A pair of under-the-radar ETFs tracking made-in-America investment themes are quietly gathering assets, reflecting investor conviction that domestic manufacturing will thrive in the next presidential administration.】

item.title: 美国足球协会为亚特兰大地区新基地出售 2 亿美元债务
item.description: 美国足协本周将通过出售市政债务的方式借入 2 亿美元，这将有助于该组织为在亚特兰大地区建设新的国家训练中心和总部提供资金。【原文：The US Soccer Federation is set to borrow $200 million this week through a sale of municipal debt that will help the organization finance the construction of a new national training center and headquarters in the Atlanta area.】

item.title: 日本新任外汇主管称弱势日元对经济弊大于利
item.description: 日本新任命的最高外汇官员表示，近期日元疲软对日本经济弊大于利。【原文：Recent yen weakness has done more harm than good for the Japanese economy, according to Japan’s newly appointed top foreign exchange official, who cited intervention among the measures available to counter speculation that weighs excessively on the currency.】

item.title: 竞争对手失宠，俄罗斯谷物交易商新贵崛起
item.description: 在长期的市场领导者与俄罗斯农业监管机构发生争执之后，一家新的贸易商成为俄罗斯最大的谷物出口商。【原文：A new trader has emerged as Russia’s biggest exporter of grain, after a long-time market leader became entangled in a rift with the country’s agriculture regulator.】

item.title: 美国银行预测 S&P 已于 2024 年达到顶峰
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，S&P 500 指数可能已经录得了今年的涨幅，但该基准指数仍为投资者提供了大量机会。【原文：The S&P 500 Index has probably already logged the gains it will see this year, but the benchmark still presents ample opportunities for investors, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: CenterPoint 希望休斯顿客户承担 20 亿美元的风暴成本
item.description: 中心点能源公司（CenterPoint Energy Inc. ）希望客户承担因毁灭性的暴风雪和飓风造成的近 20 亿美元的费用，这次暴风雪和飓风造成休斯顿大都会地区数百万人停电。【原文：CenterPoint Energy Inc. wants customers to cover nearly $2 billion in costs stemming from a devastating windstorm and hurricane that blacked out millions of people across wide swaths of the Houston metro area.】

item.title: 伊朗有了一位改革派总统。他能有所作为吗？
item.description: 马苏德-佩泽什金于 7 月 30 日正式宣誓就职，是伊朗伊斯兰共和国历史上第二位改革派总统。虽然伊朗的最终权力掌握在最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊手中，但总统可以通过民众支持、政治派别和与强大机构的联系来影响政策。佩泽什金在竞选时承诺缓解与西方的紧张关系，而最近随着伊朗动员地区网络，这种紧张关系不断升级。【原文：Officially sworn into office on July 30, Masoud Pezeshkian is the second reformist president in the history of the Islamic republic of Iran. While ultimate power in the country rests with the Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, the president can influence policy by drawing on a base of popular support, political affiliations and links to powerful institutions. Pezeshkian campaigned on a promise to ease tensions with the West that have escalated recently as Iran mobilized a regional network o】

item.title: S&P Global上调评级展望，评级部门在债务激增中茁壮成长
item.description: S&P Global Inc.上调了全年利润展望，其评级机构在企业竞相进入债务市场的过程中继续蓬勃发展。【原文：S&P Global Inc. raised its full year profit outlook as its rating agency continues to flourish as companies race to debt markets.】

item.title: 股票大轮动取决于鲍威尔是否很快发出降息信号
item.description: 今年股市的强劲涨势能否继续扩大，取决于美联储在周三结束为期两天的会议后在利率问题上的言行。【原文：The continuing broadening of this year’s powerful stock market rally hangs on what the Federal Reserve does and says about interest rates after its two-day meeting wraps up on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命激进分子辩护部门全球联席主管
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has appointed Darren Novak and Alfredo Porretti to help run its shareholder engagement and mergers and acquisitions capital markets team globally, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.description: 据摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Turkey’s central bank will probably begin interest-rate cuts in as early as two months as disinflation takes hold, according to a senior executive at JPMorgan Chase & Co., despite official guidance that prices could take longer to fall.】

item.title: Viaro 同意从壳牌和埃克森手中购买英国北海天然气资产
item.description: Viaro Energy Ltd. 同意从壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）和埃克森美孚石油公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）手中收购英国北海的一些天然气田，使这家控股公司首次成为英国的海上运营商。【原文：Viaro Energy Ltd. agreed to buy a number of gas fields in the UK North Sea from Shell Plc and Exxon Mobil Corp., giving the closely held company its first role as an offshore operator in the country.】

item.title: 阿克曼支持的科技公司创始人试图兑现 "伯克希尔 2.0 "的承诺
item.description: 加拿大企业家安德鲁-威尔金森（Andrew Wilkinson）早年决定放弃记者职业，自学网页设计，事实证明他的决定是有利可图的，使他成为一家价值超过 3 亿美元的技术投资公司的主要所有人。【原文：Canadian entrepreneur Andrew Wilkinson’s early decision to ditch a career as a journalist and teach himself web design has proved lucrative, making him the majority owner of a technology investment firm worth more than $300 million.】

item.title: 阿克曼的美国封闭式基金计划下周首次公开募股 20 亿美元
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）计划首次公开发售的美国封闭式基金预计将募集到 20 亿美元，不到这位亿万富翁对冲基金经理本月早些时候提出的销售目标的 1/10。【原文：Bill Ackman’s planned initial public offering for a US closed-end fund is expected to bring in $2 billion, less than 1/10th the target the billionaire hedge-fund manager suggested the sale could raise earlier this month.】

item.title: 基金从铜市撤资 200 亿美元，大牛市交易终结
item.description: 自 5 月中旬以来，基金经理们已经平仓了 200 多亿美元的铜看涨押注，对中国需求的担忧日益加剧，引发了对最重要工业商品之一铜的快速抛售。【原文：Money managers have closed out more than $20 billion in bullish copper bets since mid-May, with mounting worries about Chinese demand helping to spark a rapid exodus from one of the most important industrial commodities.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡咖啡因供应担忧缓解而维持在三周低位附近
item.description: 阿拉比卡期货接近三周来的最低点，因为交易商评估认为，头号种植国巴西的天气条件有所改善，加上出货量加快，有助于缓解供应紧张。【原文：Arabica futures traded near the lowest in three weeks as traders assess better weather conditions in top-grower Brazil, along with accelerating shipments that have helped ease supply tightness.】

item.title: 香奈儿从高级私人债务市场融资 7 亿欧元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，香奈儿已通过私募债券销售筹集了超过 7 亿欧元（约合 7.58 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Chanel has raised over €700 million ($758 million) from a privately-placed bond sale, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 德国通胀意外加快向欧洲央行发起挑战
item.description: 德国 7 月份通胀加速，这可能会使欧洲中央银行在进一步降息时更加谨慎。【原文：German inflation accelerated in July, evidence that may add to the European Central Bank’s caution as it moves toward further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 监管机构正在审查瑞银对瑞士信贷客户的审查情况
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构正在密切关注瑞银集团如何接管瑞士信贷的客户，因为瑞士正努力降低其最大银行的风险。【原文：Switzerland’s financial regulator is taking a close look at how UBS Group AG is bringing over Credit Suisse clients, as the country seeks to mitigate risks at its largest bank.】

item.title: 德米特里-巴利亚斯尼与大型 Pod 商店竞争 "非常困难
item.description: 对冲基金创始人德米特里-巴利亚斯尼（Dmitry Balyasny）经营着世界上最大的多策略对冲基金之一，他要告诉那些想追随他脚步的人一句话：不要在家里尝试。【原文：Hedge fund founder Dmitry Balyasny runs one of the world’s biggest multistrategy hedge funds, and he has a message for anyone thinking of following in his footsteps: Don’t try this at home.】

item.title: Grifols 的新审计员发现与中国股权有关的非现金会计差异
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，西班牙 Grifols SA 公司将对其持有的上海 RAAS 股份进行意外的会计调整。【原文：Spain’s Grifols SA is set to report an unexpected accounting adjustment related to its stake in Shanghai RAAS, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 当 FOMC 会议召开时，历史同样有利于股票和债券牛市
item.description: 在美联储官员开始为期两天的政策会议之际，历史站在了股票和债券多头一边。【原文：History is on the side of stock and bond bulls as Federal Reserve officials kick off a two-day policy meeting.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 67,000 美元，交易员在思考美国的加密货币走势
item.description: 比特币跌破 67,000 美元大关，因为交易员们在评估美国政府可能出售其持有的大量加密货币的信号。【原文：Bitcoin slipped below the $67,000 mark as traders took stock of signals that the US government may sell portions of its sizable crypto holdings.】
